thread.title: Listen: New Mastodon Album Has A Triangle Solo [News]
thread.title_full: Listen: New Mastodon Album Has A Triangle Solo [News]

title: Listen: New Mastodon Album Has A Triangle Solo [News]
text:
Posted 10 hours ago 5 
In the latest making-of episode of their upcoming album "Emperor of Sand," the Mastodon guys have showcased Brann Dailor's work in the percussive department. 
Among various bells and whistles in Mr. Dailor's case (which was also used as a percussive device), one of the highlights was a "triangle solo" the man delivered. 
"Emperor of Sand" is due out on March 31 as the band's seventh studio effort. You can check it all out in the embedded player below.
